sentences.en: A boy's voice cracks ( ie becomes deeper ) at puberty.
sentences.cn: 男孩在青春期嗓音改变 ( 声音变粗 ).

sentences.en: As girls go through puberty, they may sometimes feel a bit awkward.
sentences.cn: 当女孩们经历青春期时, 她们有时可能会感到有些尴尬.

sentences.en: But there is still over whether neonatal exposure can trigger early puberty.
sentences.cn: 但是,新生儿接触到双酚A是否 会引起青春发育期提前,尚存争议.

sentences.en: During puberty, young people become more interested in sex.
sentences.cn: 年轻人在青春期对性逐渐产生较大兴趣.

sentences.en: Fourteen is a fairly normal age for a girl to reach puberty .
sentences.cn: 14 岁是女孩进入青春期相当正常的一个年龄。

sentences.en: He reached puberty at the age of fourteen.
Margaret had reached the age of puberty.
sentences.cn: 玛格丽特已到了青春期。

sentences.en: The body undergoes many changes during puberty.
sentences.cn: 身体在青春期期间会发生许多变化.

sentences.en: The boy's voice is beginning to crack at the age of puberty.
sentences.cn: 这男孩子的嗓音在发育期开始变得粗声粗气.

sentences.en: The FDA is considering an implant to delay puberty in girls.
sentences.cn: FDA正在考虑使用一种植入片延长女孩的青春期.

sentences.en: The figure of a girl fills out at puberty.
sentences.cn: 姑娘的身段在青春期变得丰满.

sentences.en: The setting for breast cancer development may be in the decade after puberty.
sentences.cn: 乳癌的发生在青春期后10年内即已决定.

sentences.en: The years of puberty and early womanhood are difficult, even frightening, for many girls.
sentences.cn: 青春期的几年是困难的, 甚至对有的女孩来说是恐怖的.

sentences.en: With puberty, young and males also become capable of reproduction.
sentences.cn: 随着青春期的到来, 青年男女也开始有生殖能力了.

sentences.en: You reach puberty in your teens.
sentences.cn: 人十多岁就到达青春期.

sentences.en: Young people go through a period of fast growth, called puberty.
sentences.cn: 青少年会经历一段快速成长期, 称为青春期.

phrases.tran_cn: 性早熟；早熟青春期；性早熟症

trans.tran_cn: 青春期，春情发动期，开花期，发身
trans.tran_en: the stage of physical development during which you change from a child to an adult and are able to have children
